janadhipathi karyalaya ha krushikarma amathyanshaya ekwa diyath karana me dharmika gowi wadasatahanata ekwimata awashya wisthara pathrika saha ayadumpath pradeshaye gowijana sewa karyalawalin laba ganna puluwan.
aththatama me swayankriya robolage sankalpaya ada eeye pahala wu deyak nemeyi.
lankawe aya ekathu wela karana hama podu wadakadima ethumage nomasuru dayakathwaya labena bawayi danaganna labune.
buththala polisiya me sambandhayen wimarshana sidu karayi.
anna ee wage thamange wisanduma kiyanna.
pasuwa ema tharunaya wisin thaman andagena aa wasthraya sambandhawa kanagatuwa palakara thaman nisiparidi nawatha ena bawata pawasa ethanin nikma giya.
menna api dakina widhiyata yukthiya itu kirimata gatha yuthu hadisi kriya margahaya.
eya dan pawathina widiyata thamanta thaman witharak kramayata wadiya sarthaka kramayak. 2003 wasaredith aarthika awapathayakata oya ratawal muhuna dunna.
wayugolaya wisha wayuwala misha්ranayak wiya.
kathak kunak nathiwa apita kiyawanna dewal liyana umbaata waradinne naha...kithulage thaththatath niwan sapa labewa..!

pawichchi karanawath athine.
ohu apa wetha kala wishesha prakashaye widiyowa pahathin dakwa atha.
upakalpana karanna oone, laba ganna thiyana thorathuru walata anuwane rawi.
ge gawam thiyena polisiye nama kiwwa nam kisi awulak na..

merata idikirim kshethraya yalith wegawath gamanakata mula pura thibenawa megha kularathna adhyaksha, maga injiniyarin pud samagama me wana wita yalith idikirim kshethraya wegawath gamanakata mula pura thibenawa .apa yalith rata pura apage idikirim wada bim hi meheyum katayuthu aarambha karamin thibenawa.

aneka dan, wasara 25 - 30 k thisse mewani awastha 3th withara athiwuna.
nathnan wanda wenna atadeka kapagena hitapu eka lamaya thamangeyi kiyawiya?
suraj hithanne yaluwek wage.
oya danaganna oona thawa yamak thiyenawa.
“ dan meya bandala inne pradi wa da?“
mama monawa kiyala karannada wasthuwe?
samajawadaya nathnam maranaya!
apurwathwayen piripun jathaka kathawakwana kusa jathakaya kawsilumina thula nawajiwayen upatha laba atha.
ada ee hama deyakma ithin mathakayak witharayi...”piya himi nikma gosin sath wasak gewi giyath ayata danenne ada eeye ganata.”thawamath mata hinen penawa.
mama me ada eeye patan gaththu , palamu post eke palamu koment ekama dukagen labunu...
widuhalpathith apekshakayek, pohottu namayojana patha්rayakata erehiwa rit pethsamak.
mata idak labuna gaman kiyawanne, umbaayi, aruyi, rawiyayi liyana ewa issa issellama...
ehi thibenne krururathwaya misa lingika aawegashilithwayak no we.
"ethakota oyage ath deken alla ganna epa da mama?"
sakakaruwan maligakanda mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamithaya.
nathnam yu. en. pi. ekata witharak denna thibuna.

pura wasara hathalis pahak (45) lokayage hitha suwa pinisa dharmaya deshana karamin da, sancharaya karaminda, labhapekshawen thorawa samaja mehewarak kala gauthamayan wahanse parinirwanayata path wuye da wesak pura pasaloswak poho dinakaya.
ithin mama me kiyanda yana katha ekakatawath ganu lamayinge sambandhayak na.
eekane mama kiyanne ...
boho durata naha.......
manawa himikam kriyakarin
lawata podi podekuth giya eda.
wahanawala, payin yana ena aya wisin thana thana dama giya plastik bothal, polithin kawara, indul, mala muthra aadiya ketharam pramanayak dakinnata labe da?
meka epa wenawa ban...
durin indagena balan innam oya hinawena hati...
me mohotha shrilanipa manthri kandayame ekwimath samaga pohottuwa kisiyam mattamakin idiriyata pamina thibena mohothak.
eya awasan kerune pasugiya aprel masa wisithun wani da ya.
inna hitinna thanak thiyanawa, rassawak thiyenawa, amathara aadayamak thiyenawa, jiwithe aayi patan ganna kal thiyenawa.
ada aadaraya danima aadaraya widima weleda paribhogika bhandayak ganatama rupanaya wela.
thoru moru ahu wena maha bhayanaka dal walin hal masso sutus gala lissala yanawa malli.

eheth 1829 di kolbruruk – kamaran komishan sabhawe nirdesha athara adatan apata wadagan wana nirdeshayak pali dakwa nibe.pama nirdeshaye sandahan karanne aandukarayage anthanomanika balathala adukirima sandaha aandukrama prathisanskarana samudayak handunwadimata amatharawa inshrisi aanduwa bha samajaya athara bala thulanayak ha sanwaranayak athi kirima sandaha puwathpath ratata hadunwadima awashya bawayi.
“mada gagena inna oyata lajja nadda niranga .”
samarum pilima wage dewal nam wadagath.
sar nodanenna apita kindiyak damme.
ekak blog eka wahanna adahasak nathikama...
thetha walle athi walikata, jalaya ha bandhanayak athikaragena ghana karanawa.
dengu suwapath kara ganimata wedakama men ma hedakama da hari hariyata awashyaya.
ehema wenna oona neda gayani, oyata sthuthiyi.
mama porondu wenawa ee aadare wenath kenekuta denne naha kiyala

me hara winayagam namin yuropaye sita kriyathmaka wana koti nawa nayakaya yayi kiyana winayagamurthi sekarapilleta erehiwada buddhi ansha niladharin 2010 nowambar 24 da kolambaa adhikaranayen warenthuwak labagena thibuni.
meya lehesi pahasu karyayak noweyi.
hithawathakuge maranayakin pasuwa pawule podu manobhawayak thibima ekalath mekalath lankaweth pitaratath podu thaththwayak.
ee wagema thamayi apita kagewath anunge kama kanna oone na.
eyage palamuwani nirmanathmaka wadeth awissawelle kale.
mahimaya kochchara romantik porak da kiyala?' ...
lunu diyehi pengi thibu sama pothu galawennata wu athara diwa thuwala wi idimuni.
me sareth apita hadissiyak naha.
oonama kenekuta sahathika pathrayak ganna puluwanne.
polisiya mawa hoyana nisa mama digatama ee hene radi hitiya.
mata athdakim thiyanawa...
“wandana gamane miththaniya” me wanawiya pruthugalaya, spanynyaya, polanthaya, eeshrayelaya, brasilaya saha arjantinawa yana ratawala siddhasthana kara gos thibe.
kalen eliyata aapu gaman thamayi me aathal ganne.

eksath jathika pakshaye mahalekam akila wiraj kariyawasam pawasanne mewara parlimenthu maha mathiwaranayedi eksath jathika pakshaya wenuwen niyojya nayaka sajith pe්ramadasa mahatha agamathi apekshaka lesa nam karana lesa yojana ha adahas rasak idiripathwi athi bawayi.
sinha rashiye di kisima g rahayeku uchachathwayata ho nichathwayata path nowe.

shri lanka nidahas pakshaye jyeshta upa sabhapathiwaraya ema prakashaya kale wishwasabhanga yojanawata pakshawa chandaya dun ema pakshaye manthriwarun kandayama samanga ada (aprel 05) janadhipathiwaraya hamuwimen anathuruwa bibisi sinhala sewaya samanga sakachchawakata ekwemini.

rate ha parlimenthuwe awadhanaya wenath siddhi kerehi yomu kara ratata ahithakara panath ketumpath sammatha kara ganime wayamaka aanduwa di sitina bawath, aandukrama wyawasthawa sambandhayen da ewanima piyawarak anugamanaya karanu athi bawath ee mahatha sandahan kaleya.
happe mamath hithuwe mehema siddhi aduyi kiyala dan balapuwahama hithanawata wada mehema dewal wenawa.
jyeshta sahakara lekhakadhikari(
16 antharjalayedi athyawashya wana sayit.(aniwaryenma balanna)
rajya amathyawaraya labana 26 wanada aanduwen iwath wana bawatayi ema aaranchi marga wadiduratath sandahan karanne.

kaluthara bombuwala shri subodhirajarama mulasthana maha wiharaya athulu wiharasthana kihipayaka adhipathithwaya darana unwahanse siya diwi gamane 61 weni wiyata pasugiyada pa thabuha. 1957 juni 20 wanida bulathsinhala halwathura gramaye di janmalabhaya labu manage jayawardhana nam kumaruwa halwathura kanishta widyalayen mulika adhyapanaya labi ya. 1969 mayi 02 wanida uuragala shri thapodhanaramayedi halwathure assaji namin pawidi diwiyata athulath wuha.
oba pirimiya hari aakarawa handuna gath ayekda? ...
mama loku aashawakin saha kapawimakin me charithaya karanne.
nawa yowun paramparawa niyojanaya karana pasal sisunge rasawindanayath - aakalpath yahapath athata wenas kirima kala yuthu deyak wagema karannath puluwan deyak.
ee eka komisam warthawakwath madhyawalinwath dakala naha.
maha kalawata athulu wanne ee osseya.
mama dakina mata ahena mata danena dewal ekkasu karala hiniyata wiyana hithiwili gonna thanpath karala thiyana thanak…
kattiyama dagalala dagalala hembath wela hitiye.

sammana sandaha salaka balu siyalu nirnayakayan ihalin sapura thibimath, pradhana pele darshakayan thula shakthimathwa thama kriyakarithwaya pawathwa ganimata hakiwima saha paribhogika sewawan nisa mema gaurawanwitha sammanayata himikam liyu lankeya wanija bankuwa lesa abhises labannata owuhu samath winayi komarshal bankuwa pawasayi.
